title: Bug 2345 - Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
description: Bug 2345 - Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
OB: When a file is already open in the editor, selecting 'Open With...' and choosing a different editor type does not open the file with the selected editor. Instead, the current editor remains active.
EB: When a file is already open in the editor, selecting 'Open With...' and choosing a different editor type should open the file with the selected editor. The current editor should be deactivated and the new editor should take its place.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. In the Navigator, select the test.xml file.
4. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With...' from the context menu.
5. Select 'Default Text Editor' from the list of available editors.
6. Verify that the file is not opened with the selected editor and the current editor remains active.
